request.description:
**Error codes**

PROMO_002: Can be one of the following

- Code does not exists
- Consumer does not exists
- Promotion does not exists
- Promotion category does not exists
- Promotion not activated for the restaurant
- Restaurant does not have the promotion activated
- Restaurant does not have configured timezone

PROMO_003: Already redeemed

PROMO_004: Promotion not available"
